cab.content: S 15 C RE I,BATTLE SITUATION - NOON - 20th SEPTEMBER, 1918.WESTERN FRONT:., British FrontsOn the GTn. QUENTIN battle front we have improved our position north of LEMPIBS, and have taken MALASSISE FARM (south-east of EPEHY.)We have retaken M0EU7RES, Otherwise there is no change on the British front.The number of prisoners captured in the ST. QUENTIN ' battle now exceeds 10,000, and over 60 guns have been taken, Prench Front0South of ST, C-il JEN TIN the French have taken CASTRES and are in the village of ESSIGNY-LE-GRAND,North of the AISNE progress has been made north of VAILLYoITALIAN AND MACEDCKIAN FRONTS-, There is nothing to report.General Staff,War Office, S,W,1. 2Oth September, 1918*Issued at I2r20 p.m?
